151.content:
Your jaw hit the bed, "You what?"

"You heard me, Sue. Listen, your mom hates me right? Well the way I see it is: the reason she's such a bitch to me is that she thinks I'm just a little stinker. BUT, and here's the kicker, if I can prove to her that I can fart like her, she'll respect me and let me hang out with you!"

"You're crazy."

"Crazy like a skunk!" Ashley said, and you just had to correct her.

"It's crazy like a fox, Ashley, and second, there's no way-"

KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK

Crap, it's your mom!

"Sue?" She shouts through the door, "Is someone in there?"

You open your mouth to respond, but Ashley shoves her hand over your face.

"You're damn right there is!" Ashley yells back, "Get in here Helen!"

You felt like you were going to die. Your mom threw the door open, her eyes absolutely flaming with blind hatred.

"YOU!" Your mom said, pointing her finger at Ashley, who sat there with the smuggest look on her face before standing up.

"Hold it, Mrs. Sue's-Mom-Helen," Ashley said, "I have it on good authority that you have never turned down a fart contest! Never once! Not even that time a horse with IBS looked at you funny. So lemme ask you this: are you about to start?"

Your mom cocked an eyebrow at Ashley, "That's real cute kid. I'd love to gas your face off, but I think you know that no fart contest can go on without an impartial judge."

"Which is exactly why I have Sue!" Ashley said, "Think about it: she's your daughter and my best friend, her heart's on both sides."

Your mom stood there, looking the two of you over with her arms crossed, "...fine. What's the wager?"

"If you win, I'll never set foot in your house again. If I win, you not only have to let me come over whenever I want, you also have to let me have dinner if I happen to come over and you're having dinner."

"Oh no, nice try kid," your mom retorted, "I see what you're trying. The only outcome that benefits Sue is you winning. So if I win, you're never allowed to come back AND you have to pay back Sue for all the times she paid for your lunch."

"But that's like, fifty bucks!" Ashely moaned, "Fine. Deal. Sue, you know how this works, sniff each of our farts and tell us who was the worst."

"Hey, wait a-" and before you can say a thing, Ashley stuffed her ass in your face and ripped a mammoth fart. And not just in size, in smell! You felt like you were about to pass out, before your mom turned on the fan on your nightstand and blew away the smell.

"Get that loser's fart out of your nose Sue! Smell mommy's gas!" Said your mom, before cutting the cheese in a big way. Your brain was on fire from the stink, but before you could properly register it, Ashley shoved her ass in your face again.

"Hey!" She said, "You cheated! You blew my fart away before it could blossom into its full potential!"

She farted again, this one even more rotten. You couldn't even begin to register it before your mom put her butt on the other side of your head and farted herself.

"Well maybe if your farts weren't so weak,they wouldn't have been blown away, shrimp!"

"Hag!"

"Pig!"

"Cow!"

And it went like this for what felt like forever, your mom and your best friend flinging insults at each other and blowing farts down your nose. You were about to pass out or maybe even die when they simultaneously demanded to know,

"Who won?!"

"Also, to get the most stink out of this round, we are going to do it three times. First, in sweatpants, second in panties and third will be bare bottom." Her mom said, with a big a smile as Ashley. "I'm going first! Hope your ready, Sue!" Ashley, hopped onto the bed, turned around and plopped down on Sue's face. "Ahhh, comfy. Glad, we modified that neck pillow to make you into a fart pillow." Ashley said, as she wiggled her bottom on Sue. "OK, smell this Sue!" Ashley ripped a big booming fart onto Sue and kept her butt pressed down to seal in the odor. "That was a big one, huh?" Ashley got off her face. Sue had a second to sniff fresh air, before her mom sat down on her face next. "Aww, my cheeks just swallow your little face up, sweetie. Hehe, you'll get a full wiff of this." She farted a hot one that warmed Sue's face and her cheeks. "Oooo, my buns are feeling toasty now." Sue's mom rised off her's face and before Sue could get any relief, a red panties covered tush quickly squished her face. "No time to breath! This is fun, huh? Mmm, smelly panties. Haven't washed this in weeks!" Sue's poor nose could tell. The panties were rank and they will only get worse, when Ashley farts. Right on que, Ashley let out a SBD that went straight through the panties, up her nose and to her brain, nearly knocked her out. "Oh, that was a long stinky one! You like the long ones?" Ashley asked, getting up and looking down at poor Sue. She could only make a small muffled no, before her mom's large green pantied covered rear squashed her face. "These are my binge undies. I haven't washed them once and I've passed so much gas into them for hours on end." She was telling the truth from what Sue was smelling from them. Just like Ashley, her mom also broke a silent wind that instantly made Sue want to puke! "Ohh, I can feel you squirming down there! I'm sure I will win, now!" Her mom, proudly got off and then Sue saw a horribly disgusting sight descending in slow motion to her face. Splat, Ashley's sweaty smelly cheeks made its self comfortable on Sue's face. "Oh my gosh! This feels amazing! When I win this contest, your face is definitely going to be my new seat cushion from now on!" Sue was horrified to hear that, as Ashley joyfully wiggled her butt all over her face. Sue's nose was unfortunately right up Ashley's dirty brown hole awaiting the worst. Suddenly the worst came and it was a really wet fart that spluttered out on her nose. It literally caused Sue to gag and very nearly vomit. Sue thrashed around the best she could to get free! "Oh man! You feel that sense of relief too? Now I'm all sticky. Hey, be a friend and use your nose to wipe my ass for me, alright." Sue absolutely could not believe that Ashley was using her nose to wipe her booty clean! After that sicking ordeal, Ashley got up, feeling clean enough down there. "It's almost over my dear Sue. Now you just have mommy's big butt to handle!" With that said, she sat down and completely covered Sue's entire head! Only her hair was sticking from beneath her. "Wow! She was right! Your face makes a perfect seat cushion!" Sue couldn't believe that her mom agreed with Ashley on that! Then she heard gargling noises coming from the hole her nose was stuck tight in. Like Ashley, a wet fart splattered on to her and it was so horrible to experience again! "Whoa, that felt great coming out. Hey, since you did it for her, you wouldn't mind cleaning me up to, right?" Sue wanted to scream that she did mind, but it only came out as a mumble. Her mom grind down on her all around her nose. "I think my ass is feeling nice and clean right now. You're a good little brown noser. Hehe." Her mom giggled at her pun as she got off. "Okay, Sue who won?!?!" They both asked at the same time!
1513.title: You pass out before you can answer!

choices: Fart Wrestling, panties only, loser by either tapping or passing out.
Fart contest, my mom's the judge, we list our terms.
155.content:
Upon hearing that, Sue balked at her "best friend" - still reeling from her gassy barrage - for her absurd words. If it wasn't a room filling ripper, SBD, or dutch oven when they're hanging out, or a face sit whenever they wrestled on the mat in the wrestling team or away from school, Sue's had MORE than enough experiences smelling Ashley's farts.

Sitting up at practically lightning speeds with a pissed expression, Sue yelled a defiant, "Hell no!" Much to Ashley's dismay.

"Why not?" She demanded frowning.

"Why n--I just got gas blasted in one of your dutch ovens!" Sue retorted. "And am still smelling it too!"

Ashley rolled her eyes. "Oh please, it's not like you haven't sniffed my gas before, Sue Sue." She said putting a hand on her hip.

Sue growled at the nickname, throwing the covers off of her as she stood up off the bed and got into Ashley's face, revealing her own massive panty clad ass.

"Want to put your ass where your mouth is, Assley?" She said glaring.

"What's the stakes, Stinky?" Ashley replied glaring back.
